sections.status: however, it is not a required prerequisite for the course. This course provides additional support for students who want to feel more confident in their math skills. Note: Partially online course with required on-campus meetings 8:55-11:00am on Thursdays 2/19, 3/19, 4/23 (exams) and 5/21 (final exam) and online meetings Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays 8:55-11:00am, through Zoom. Online instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas and Zoom software. Access to a computer with audio and video capability is required. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.

prerequisites: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process or completion of a course taught at or above the level of intermediate algebra.
